column4: hi, i was wondering if anybody has ubuntu 7.04 running on a vaio C series. i
i am interested in buying a vaio series C and wanna make sure hardware is compatible
Can you give some specs on the hardware? And are you buying this in store of online?
in the store. they have choice of celeron or core duo
the store? you think they'll let me do that?
I have never tried it myself, but if you make it clear you are going to buy something?
that's the problem i'm in japan and my japanese is very limited. they'll probably think i am crazy
maybe i am better off buing a Dell online, at least that way i know it's working
There might be a better way but you could just use gnome-panel for a panel
Nothing, but this is a support channel, you want ubuntu-offtopic
You can get pidgin from getdeb
what is getdeb and what does pidgin have to do with gimp?
It means that I have official stayed up to late and need to go to sleep :)
